title: Podcast #051 – Reddiyo knows how you should train before you even sign up
content:
What if your trainer workouts could be automatically created based on your past performance, so you get stronger without having to think about it at all? In this episode we’re talking with the founders of Reddiyo, a smart training app that uses your workout data and performance to algorithmically determine your next workout. It’s an

The post Podcast #051 – Reddiyo knows how you should train before you even sign up appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Tyler Benedict
